column5: ENBCA ENB Michigan Governor already working behind the scenes to make sure states needs are met with Line 5 shutdown In a separate action on Friday Gov Whitmer issued an executive order that will create an Upper Peninsula UP energy task force to address the regions energy needs in the event of a Line 5 shutdown Also if Michigan loses the court case AG Nessel could actually act independently through a lawsuit to shut down Line 5 anyway This is a LONG MESS On sidelines
